description: Kok Nuwan Silwa Alias Rathuwa and Nammuni Arachchilage Kalana Wijemal Silva Vs. Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Kok Nuwan Silwa Alias Rathuwa and Nammuni Arachchilage Kalana Wijemal Silva Vs. Hon. Attorney General
keywords: -Refreshing memory of a witness. -Absence of common intention. -Identification of the accused. -Facts not disputed are assumed to be admitted.
